question: 鍛える
sourceMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>forge</kanji> and the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to forge</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>to temper</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: <vocabulary>To forge</vocabulary> something, you need to have your <reading>kit</reading> (<ja>きた</ja>) with you. Without it, you won't be doing any forging at all.
